name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Barcodes & address labels for seller central

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scan Barcodes to check order details, process returns, search. / Add barcodes and more to packing slips. / Print address labels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds barcodes and a bit more to the packing slips of amazon's seller central.

Also it adds support for hardware barcodes scanners without the need for clicking into an input field first. So if you are on sellercentral orders page, you can simply scan an orderID barcode and the details view of this order will be opened. If you are on returns page scan a RMA barcode: It to opens the return case for this orderID. If you scan an ASIN it shows it in inventory.  

You can also use the scanner in Amazon shop to start a search for EAN, UPC, ISBN barcodes.
And you can use it to scan the parcels you ship, for an easy confirmation of shipments incl. tracking numbers.

More features for packing slips (invoices)
• your company logo
• edit a packing slip before printing
• packing slip without prices 
• print # of pcs bigger if sold > 1 
• your own greeting text ".... give us a five star rating... "
• name of packing agent
• preset print margins

Other features:
• link ASINs on order details page to show it in inventory with one click.

YOU NEED:
To scan barcodes, you need a hardware barcode scanner. New scanners you can get on ebay starting around 20 € / USD. Your barcode scanner needs to read code128 and work in HID mode (this means it works like an USB or Bluetooth keyboard). It also have to send an ENTER (RETURN) after each scan. All these points are the presets for a lot of scanners. If you scan some barcodes into a text app and every barcode will be shown in a new line, it seems to be fine. Otherwise consult the manual of your scanner.

This is beta software, developed mainly for our own use. This software It is like it is - no warranty given!

I have published it to see if other people also will find it useful. If you like it, please give me a good feedback to encourage me. If you miss something also give me a good feedback and include in your text what you miss. But please don't expect I can implement this for you. I have a 16 hours working day with selling on amazon. Anyhow, may be I will find your idea / critics also useful for me, so possibly I will realize something.

Data protection statement

By using this tool you agree to the following: 
The use of this tool will be tracked by google analytics. So google analytics may process and save when you use my tool,which functions you use, when you install or deinstall it, your IP address, browser and operating system and such technical data on their servers somewere in the world. 
Also your settings for this extension will be saved in your google account. You can clear these data in the settings of this extension. If you use the feature "Collect tracking IDs", the order ID's, tracking ID's and time of scan will be saved in your browser's local storage (= your local hard disk). Use the "clear" key to remove it.
Neither me nor my extension will store any other of your data or your customers data. 
This extension, does any data processing in your browser while browsing the amazon sellercentral pages. If you are on a amazon or sellercentral page and scan a suitable barcode, it may sends this barcode to an amazon server to search for this barcode and to show the amazon result page.
